genre_description: Historical romance and family drama set in 1820s New York, centered on the religious and social conflicts surrounding the early Latter Day Saint movement.

project_assessment.explanation: The story contains no AI characters, robotic entities, or technological elements. It is a historical religious drama and romance set in the early 19th century. Although it explores themes of alignment (faith/loyalty) and misalignment (betrayal/crime) through human characters, it fails the project's objective of creating narratives featuring AI systems.
